package.name: kuka_kr150_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the KUKA KR 150 (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for KUKA KR 150 manipulators. This currently includes the -2 variant only.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in Series 2000 KR 150-2, version PF0020/E/1/0709. All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
